trans-unit.source: AccuWeather Current and Forecast show
Show AccuWeather data as Current and Forecast
AccuWeather
Show AccuWeather data as Current and Forecast
AccuWeather Current data import.
Import AccuWeather Current data as a JSON file.
AccuWeather Hourly data import.
Import AccuWeather Hourly forecast data as JSON file.
AccuWeather Daily data import.
Import AccuWeather Daily forecast data as a JSON file.
AccuWeather Application Key to accuweathermap.org e.g. AA33DBynuJPWFAieW7YYOTbGeTqBGsXg
Folder path to save JSON import file e.g /fileadmin/accuweathermap/
JSON import file name e.g current.json or hourly.json or daily.json

Place Id of the place to display weather e.g 2877452 (Get Place Id by http://dataservice.accuweather.com/locations/v1/cities/geoposition/search.json?apikey=ApiKeyq=Latitude Of The Place,Longitude of the Place)
AccuWeather Application Key is required!
JSON import storage folder path is required!
JSON Import storage file name is required!
Place Id of the place to display weather is required!
AccuWeather Current weather base url
AccuWeather Hourly forecast base url
AccuWeather Daily forecast base url
What weather to show
Current Weather
Hourly Forecast
Daily Forecast
Weather JSON file path e.g fileadmin/accuweather/current.json or fileadmin/accuweather/hourly.json or fileadmin/accuweather/daily.json
